product:removal.text: TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing them. It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            1. Unscrew the battery cover.            2. With batteries inserted, press the pair key once.            3. The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Remove the screw on the back of the water leak detector, then slide and lift off the face plate.
Remove the screw and lift the battery cover.
Insert batteries and press the button once. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: Utilitech, Everspring, indoor, water, leak, flood, sensor, safety, zwave, battery

product:name: Smoke Detector

product:removal.text: TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing them. It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            1. Open the battery slide. On the device, press and hold the Test button.           2. While sliding the battery drawer closed, continue hodling down the Test button until you hear a short beep, and then release the Test button.           3. The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Slide the battery drawer open.
Insert batteries, ensuring correct orientation.
Press and hold the test button on the front of the device. Keep it held down as you slide the battery drawer closed, then release the button. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: First, Alert, smoke, fire, detector, sensor, safety, alarm, indoor, zwave, battery

Press and hold the test button on the front of the device. Keep it held down as you slide the battery drawer closed, then release the button. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: First, Alert, smoke, CO, carbon monoxide, fire, detector, sensor, safety, alarm, indoor, zwave, battery

product:name: Touchscreen Thermostat (Z-Wave)

product:removal.text: TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing them. It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            1. Press System on the thermostat's touch screen.            2. To the right of the Done button, simultaneously press and hold the second and fourth blank square.           3. On the left, press the Up Arrow to select rF 10.           4. On the right, press the Down Arrow to select 0.           5. The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Install the thermostat as described in the manufacturer's instructions and set the correct time and date.
Press the 'System' button once, then press and hold both indicated keys until the thermostat screen changes to show up / down arrows.
Press the leftmost down arrow until the screen shows 'rf10'. Use the rightmost arrows to select '1'. The thermostat is now in pairing mode. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.
To enable the 'Auto' thermostat setting, use the leftmost arrows to select '0300'. Use the rightmost arrows to select '1'. Press the 'DONE' button in the bottom left corner.
Arcus has set up an energy-efficient schedule for your thermostat. Tap the CLIMATE card on the dashboard to edit the schedule and change the thermostat mode.

product:keywords: Honeywell, indoor, thermostat, programmable, 7, day, touchscreen, climate, hvac, heater, air, conditioner, zwave, battery, TH8320ZW

product:name: Thermostat (RTH6580WF Wi-Fi)

product:pair.text: Install the thermostat as described in the manufacturer's instructions. Be sure to create a My Total Connect Comfort account and register the thermostat to it.
Tap 'Next' to log into your Honeywell Total Connect Comfort account. Linking your account to Arcus allows information sharing between Honeywell and Arcus.

product:keywords: Honeywell, indoor, thermostat, programmable, 7, day, climate, hvac, heater, air, conditioner,  wifi, wi-fi, RTH6580WF, RTH6500WF

product:name: Touchscreen Thermostat (RTH8580WF Wi-Fi)

Tap 'Next' to log into your Honeywell Total Connect Comfort account. Linking your account to Arcus allows information sharing between Honeywell and Arcus.

product:keywords: Honeywell, indoor, thermostat, programmable, 7, day, touchscreen, climate, hvac, heater, air, conditioner,  wifi, wi-fi, RTH9580

product:name: Programmable Thermostat

product:removal.text: TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing them. It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            1. Hold the Fan button until the screen changes to the Setup menu.           2. Press the Up button until ZWAVE is shown on the status Line, then press SELECT. (Note: Remove should be shown on the status line).           3. Press SELECT again.            4. The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Install the thermostat as described in the manufacturer's instructions.
Press and hold the FAN button until the screen changes to the SETUP screen. Press and hold the UP button until the ZWAVE is shown on the status line.
Press Select. INSTALL should be shown on the status line. If so, press SELECT.
When SUCCESS is shown on the status line, press DONE to exit the ZWAVE screen and press DONE again to exit the SETUP screen. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.
Arcus has set up an energy-efficient schedule for your thermostat. Tap the CLIMATE card on the dashboard to edit the schedule and change the thermostat mode.

product:keywords: Arcus, GoControl, indoor, thermostat, programmable, 7, day, climate, hvac, heater, air, conditioner, zwave, battery

product:name: Lever Lock (FE599)

product:removal.text: TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing them. It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            1. On the lock, press the Schlage button, enter the 6 digit program code located on the inside of the lock, and then after the Schlage button flashes, press 0.           2. The green check mark on the lock will illuminate.            3. The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: For simplicity, PIN codes are managed through the people you invite to your home. Arcus will automatically delete any PIN codes manually entered on the lock itself.
Make a note of the 6 digit program code located on the inside of the lock. Follow the manufacturer's installation instructions.
Ensure the batteries are properly installed. Enter the six digit program code. Wait for the Schlage button to flash and beep three times.
Press the Schlage button once, then press the number 0. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: Schlage, Camelot, Century, Plymouth, door, lever, lock, entry, keypad, zwave, FE599IR, battery

product:name: Touchscreen Deadbolt (BE469)

product:removal.text: TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing them. It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            1. On the lock, press the Schlage button, enter the 6 digit program code located on the inside of the lock, and then after the orange light flashes, press 0.           2. The green check mark on the lock will illuminate.            3. The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: For simplicity, PIN codes are managed through the people you invite to your home. Arcus will automatically delete any PIN codes manually entered on the lock itself.
Make a note of the 6 digit program code located on the inside of the lock. Follow the manufacturer's installation instructions.
Ensure the batteries are properly installed. Press the Schlage button once and enter the 6 digit program code. The orange light will begin to slowly flash.
Finally, press the number 0 once. The hub will beep and the green check mark will illuminate when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: Schlage, Camelot, Century, Plymouth, door, deadbolt, lock, touchscreen, BE469, entry, zwave, battery

product:name: Thermostat (CT101)

product:removal.text: TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing them. It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            1. On the thermostat, select "Mode" and then "Menu".            2. Select and hold the "Link" touchscreen button for 25 seconds. The green and yellow LEDs on the left side of the screen will flash and the word "Link" will disappear.            3. The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Install the thermostat as described in the manufacturer's instructions.
Press the Menu button once, then press 'Mate' twice. The word 'Mate' will flash on the display. The LINK icon will flash and the Hub will beep when pairing is complete.
Arcus has set up an energy-efficient schedule for your thermostat. Tap the CLIMATE card on the dashboard to edit the schedule and change the thermostat mode.

product:keywords: Arcus, indoor, thermostat, humidity, fan, control, programmable, 7, day, climate, hvac, heater, air, conditioner, zwave, ct101, battery

product:name: Hose Faucet Timer

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Squeeze the tabs on the back of controller and slide out the battery drawer.
Insert batteries into the drawer, ensuring correct orientation. Slide the drawer back into the controller.
Set the dial to "Auto". The antenna icon will flash and then remain solid, and the hub will beep when paring is complete.

product:keywords: irrigation, hose, timer, zigbee, Orbit, faucet, water, sprinkler, lawn, grass, plants, outdoor, ht8, battery

product:name: 12 Station Irrigation Timer

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Install the timer as described in the manufacturer's instructions.
Once installed, remove the plastic battery tab and connect the power. If the battery tab has already been removed, press the SYNC button 5 times.
Finally, turn the dial to 'auto'. The controller will display 'SMART MODE' and the hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: Orbit, irrigation, timer, zigbee, yard, grass lawn, outdoor, sprkinler, water, wt15

product:name: Garage Door Controller

product:removal.text: TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing them. It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            1. On the side of the garage door controller, press and release the Link button once.            2. The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Begin by attaching the tilt sensor mounting plate to the top panel of your garage door, as described in the manufacturer's instructions.
Remove the plastic battery tab from the tilt sensor and snap the sensor to the plate, ensuring both arrows are pointed up.
Plug the garage door opener into an electrical outlet close to where it will be installed. Do not connect it to your garage door motor yet.
Press the Link button on the side of the Garage Door Opener once. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.
Mount the garage door opener, connect it to your garage door motor and sync using your existing remote once as described in the manufacturer's instructions.

product:keywords: Linear, Arcus, zwave, garage, door, takeover, controller, barrier, security, lock

product:name: Glass Break Sensor

product:removal.text: TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing them. It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            1. Press the button on the glass break sensor once.            2. The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Install the glass break sensor as described in the manufacturer's instructions.
Insert the included batteries and press the button on the glass break sensor once.
An LED light will flash on the sensor until it has paired with Arcus. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: Utilitech, Linear, glassbreak, glass, break, alarm, security, zwave, battery

product:name: Water Shut-Off Valve

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Pull the enclosure off the valve. The enclosure can be powered using the adapter or batteries. If both are used the batteries provide back-up power.
Use a screw driver to remove the battery cover. Lift out the battery drawer, insert 4 batteries and place the battery drawer and cover back in the valve.
To power the valve with AC power, connect the plug to the socket on the base of the device and plug into a power outlet.
Push the enclosure back onto the valve. The blue LED will flash until it has been paired with Arcus. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.
Now you can install the valve as described in the manufacturer's instructions.

product:keywords: Waxman, Leak Smark, water, shut, off, insurance, zigbee, leak, flow, battery

product:name: Water Leak Sensor

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Use a screwdriver to remove the battery cover.
Insert the included batteries, then press the pairing button once. The LED will blink rapidly.
The hub will beep when pairing is complete. Once paired, re-attach the battery cover, then place in its final location.

product:keywords: Waxman, Leak Smark, water, insurance, zigbee, leak, battery, sensor

product:name: Tilt Sensor

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Slide open the tilt sensor's cover.
Insert a battery, or remove the plastic battery tab if a battery is already installed. An LED light will flash and the hub will beep when pairing is complete.
Once paired, replace the cover by sliding it onto the sensor. Install the tilt sensor with the groove vertical and on the right-hand side, as shown in the image.

product:keywords: Nyce, tilt, sensor, garage, alarm, security, zigbee, battery

product:name: Door Hinge Sensor

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Position the door hinge sensor near the final installation location, but do not install it yet. Remove the plastic battery tab located on the back-side slot.

The LED on the front-side of the sensor will show a sequence of yellow - red - yellow that indicates it is ready for pairing. During the pairing process, it will show a sequence of yellow - green - yellow.
The LED will flash green three times and the hub will beep when pairing is complete.
It's now time to mount the sensor to the door as described in the manufacturer's instructions.

product:keywords: Nyce, hinge, sensor, alarm, security, zigbee, battery, door, contact

product:name: Indoor Siren

product:removal.text: TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing them. It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            1. Unscrew the battery cover.            2. With batteries inserted, press the pair key once.            3. The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Loosen screw, then slide and lift the cover.
Insert batteries, ensuring correct orientation.
Press the button located between the batteries. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: Utilitech, Everspring, siren, 85, decibel, alarm, security, zwave, sound, battery

product:name: 1st Gen Contact Sensor

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Squeeze both sides together on the semi-circles and then pull off the back cover.
Insert the battery on top of the battery tab, ensuring correct orientation by matching the black dots.
Replace the cover, ensuring the tabs are aligned. The light on the sensor will flash, and the hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: AlertMe, Arcus, contact, temperature, door, window, sensor, zigbee, security, alarm, battery, DWS901

product:name: 1st Gen Motion Sensor

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Squeeze both sides together on the raised edges and then pull off the back cover.
Insert the battery on top of the battery tab, ensuring correct orientation.
Replace the cover, ensuring the tabs are aligned. The light on the sensor will flash, and the hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: AlertMe, Arcus, motion, PIR, infrared, passive, sensor, zigbee, security, alarm, indoor, battery, MOT501

product:name: 1st Gen Smart Button

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Squeeze both sides together on the raised edges and then pull off the back cover
Insert the battery on top of the battery tab, ensuring correct orientation.
Replace the cover, ensuring the tabs are aligned. The light on the sensor will flash, and the hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: AlertMe, Arcus, smart, panic, button, doorbell, zigbee, indoor, control, battery, BTN900

product:name: 1st Gen Key Fob

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Insert the supplied access tool into the small opening at the top of the key fob. Use the tool as a lever to open the key fob.
Insert the battery, ensuring correct orientation.
Slide the cover back on, and then squeeze the key fob closed. The key fob will flash, and the hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: AlertMe, Arcus, smart, keyfob, key, fob, button, control, arm, disarm, zigbee, indoor, presence, battery, KEY903

product:name: 1st Gen Smart Plug

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Plug the Smart Plug into an outlet that is no more than 10 feet from your hub in order to pair it (you can move it after pairing).
The light on the front of the Smart Plug will flash, and the hub will beep when pairing is complete. You may now move the plug to your preferred outlet.

product:keywords: AlertMe, Arcus, indoor, module, control, outlet, smart, plug, switch, energy, 120, volt, power, zigbee, SPG902

product:name: 1st Gen Security Keypad

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Remove the back of the keypad using a screwdriver.
Insert the batteries, ensuring correct orientation, then close the cover.
The "On" light will flash, and the hub will beep when pairing is complete. You may now install the keypad in its preferred location.

product:keywords: AlertMe, Arcus, smart, zigbee, security, safety, panic, alarm, keypad, key, pad, battery, KDP901

product:name: 1st Gen Care Pendant

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Insert the supplied access tool into the small opening at the top of the care pendant. Use the tool as a lever to open the pendant.
Insert the battery, ensuring correct orientation.
Slide the cover back on, and then squeeze the care pendant closed. The pendant will flash, and the hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: AlertMe, Arcus, senior, pendant, panic, indoor, zigbee, battery, care, safety, presence, PDT900

product:name: Vent

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Before installing the vent, remove the battery tab. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: Keen, vent, fan, control, climate, hvac, heater, air, conditioner, zigbee, battery

product:name: Touchscreen Lever Lock (YRL 220 Series ZWave)

product:removal.text: TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing them. It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            1. On the lock, enter the master code, and then press 7.           2. Press #, and after the keypad flashes red, press 3.           3. Press #. The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: For simplicity, PIN codes are managed through the people you invite to your home. Arcus will automatically delete any PIN codes manually entered on the lock itself.
Install the lock as described in the manufacturer's instructions, then change the master PIN so that it is 5 or more numbers long. Note: Do not use your Arcus PIN as a master PIN.
Touch the keypad with your palm to activate it. Once activated, enter the master PIN, then press #. The 'P key' will turn red. Next press '7, #'.
Press '1, #' to add the lock to Arcus. The lock and hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: Yale, real, living, door, lever, lock, touchscreen, YRL220, entry, zwave, battery

product:name: Indoor Camera

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Before plugging the camera into an outlet, connect it to a network port on your router using the supplied Ethernet cable.
Now plug the camera into a power outlet using the supplied power cord. The hub will beep when the camera is found (this may take up to 5 minutes).

product:keywords: Sercom, Sercomm, Arcus, camera, video, picture, stream, streaming, record, recording, wifi, wi-fi, ethernet, wireless, night, vision, HD, high, definition, 720p, motion, PIR, IR, indoor, 8221, RC8221

product:name: Outdoor Camera

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Before plugging the camera into an outlet, connect it to a network port on your router using the supplied Ethernet cable.
Now plug the camera into a power outlet using the supplied power cord. The hub will beep when the camera is found (this may take up to 5 minutes).

product:keywords: Sercom, Sercomm, Arcus, camera, video, picture, stream, streaming, record, recording, wifi, wi-fi, ip, ethernet, wireless, night, vision, hd, high, definition, 720p, motion, PIR, IR, outdoor, 821, OC821

product:name: Indoor/Outdoor Camera

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Open the rubber cover from the micro-USB port on the back of the camera and insert the micro-USB adapter.
Insert the supplied Ethernet cord into the micro-USB adapter and connect it to a network port on your router.
Unscrew the lock ring around the power cord and remove the rubber gasket. Next, insert the power cord through the lock ring.
Place the rubber gasket around the tip of the power cord and tighten the lock ring to the camera base.
Plug the camera into a power outlet using the supplied power cord. The hub will beep when the camera is found (this may take up to 5 minutes).

product:keywords: Sercom, Sercomm, Arcus, camera, video, picture, stream, streaming, record, recording, wifi, wi-fi, ip, ethernet, wireless, night, vision, hd, high, definition, 720p, motion, PIR, IR, outdoor, 830, OC830

product:name: Electric Water Heater Controller

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Install the water heater controller as described in the manufacturer's instructions.

Wait until the connection LED shows solid green. Make a note of the water heater ID that is shown on the control panel sticker. The 12 digit code is printed on the Wi-Fi module and is also on the user guide cover.
Enter the 12 digit code and the water heater model and serial numbers, located on the label beneath the Energy Smart™ controls.

product:keywords: Energy, Smart, Water, Heater, Whirlpool, AO, Smith

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Install the water softener as described in the manufacturer's instructions.
The green Connection Status light will flash twice, then remain solid when ready to connect.
Enter the 14 digit code found on the rating decal, located on the rim below the salt lid hinges.

product:name: Aladdin Connect Garage Door Controller

product:removal.text: By removing this device, any doors (tilt sensors) associated to this device will also be removed.  The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Install the garage door opener as described in the manufacturer's instructions.
Once installed, your garage door opener should be showing a green LED and is now ready to be paired to Arcus. Make a note of the 13 Digit ID located on the back of the device.
Enter the 13 Digit ID located on the back of the device.

product:keywords: Genie, Aladdin, Connect, garage, door, opener, takeover, ip, wifi, wi-fi, ipcd, controller, barrier, security, lock

product:name: Aladdin Connect Door Sensor

product:removal.text: Hold the button on the controller until the blue LED starts blinking.  Push and hold the button on the sensor until its LED begins to blink rapidly.  Push the button on the controller once more.  The LED on the sensor should become unlit when removal is complete.

product:pair.text: Install the door position sensor as described in the manufacturer's instructions.  Once installed, Arcus should detect a new garage door device.

product:keywords: Genie, Aladdin, Connect, garage, door, position, sensor, opener, ip, wifi, wi-fi, ipcd, controller, barrier, security, lock

product:name: Pet Door

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Remove 2 screws and lift off the battery cover.
Insert batteries checking the correct orientation and replace the cover.
The blue 'Link' light on the Pet Door will flash until it has paired successfully and then the hub will beep. Only one pet door may be added to your Arcus system.

product:keywords: PetSafe, door, entry, lock, dog, cat, zigbee, battery

product:name: Blind Controller

product:removal.text:
TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing.  
It is best if the device is within 10 feet of the hub.            
1. Ensure that all blinds and or shades are removed from the controller.           
2. Use the arrow keys on the controller to find Z-WAVE OPTIONS and select it using the center button.           
3. Use the arrows to find BASE NODE and select it using the center button.           
4. Find and select BASE NODE EXCLUDE. The controller will show EXCLUDE SUCCESS once the blind is removed.

product:pair.text: Connect and power the blinds controller as described in the printed instructions.
Press the left arrow to display Z-WAVE OPTIONS. Select it by pressing the center button. Use the arrows to find BASE NODE. Press the center button to select it.
Use the arrows to select BASE NODE INCLUDE and then press the center button. Once paired, the controller will read BASE INCLUDE SUCCESS and the hub will beep.

product:keywords: blinds, shades, springs, bali, zwave, battery

product:removal.text:
TIP: Do not use other Arcus devices at this time to avoid removing.  It is best if the Blind Controller is within 10 feet of the hub.            
1. Use the arrow keys on the controller to find Z-WAVE OPTIONS and select it using the center button.           
2. Use the arrows to find VIRTUAL NODE and select it using the center button.           
3. Find and select VIRTUAL NODE EXCLUDE then find and select the channel number of the virtual node that you wish to remove.           
The controller will show EXCLUDE SUCCESS once the blind is removed.

product:pair.text: A blinds controller must be paired before pairing blinds. If you've already done that, tap NEXT. Keep your remote, you'll need it to set the Favorite position.
Pair the blinds with the controller as described in the printed instructions included with the controller. Make a note of each blind's channel number.
Use the arrow buttons to find Z-WAVE OPTIONS and press the center button. Then use the arrows to find VIRTUAL NODE and press the center button.
Use the arrow buttons to find VIRTUAL NODE INCLUDE and press the center button.
Use the arrows to find the virtual node number that matches blind channel number and press the center button. The hub will beep when pairing is complete and the controller will read INCLUDE SUCCESS.

product:name: Arrival Sensor

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Remove the battery tab labeled "Remove to Pair". The hub will beep when pairing is complete

product:keywords: samsung, smartthings, presence, arrival, sensor

product:name: Moisture Sensor

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Detach the cover from the baseplate.
Pull the battery tab. The hub will beep when pairing is complete

product:keywords: samsung, smartthings, moisture, water, leak, sensor

product:name: Power Outlet

product:removal.text: The hub will beep when the device is successfully removed.

product:pair.text: Insert the power outlet into the wall receptacle. Ensure the wall receptacle is powered. The hub will beep when pairing is complete.

product:keywords: samsung, smartthings, plug, in, outlet, power
